document_data.mainbody:
reat Gark was a king among the goblins of Nachtur in the Feywild in the .
Gark attempted to expand his kingdom into the Moonshae Isles by sending goblins, worgs and other creatures to the Dernall Forest in Callidyrr. This was initially a small nuisance for the scattered villages found within the forest, but Garks minions later infested the entire wood.
